message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for sale. I think you'll really love it! I'm willing to let it go for $180.
Thanks for the offer, Alice! I'm really interested, but $180 is a bit out of my budget.  Would you be willing to go down to $85?
I understand you're on a budget, Bob, but I've got to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll counteroffer at $140.
Alice,  $140 is still a bit too high for me.  How about we settle on $100? It's a fair price for both of us.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob, but I'm still not willing to go that low. I'll meet you halfway from my previous offer, so I'll counteroffer at $130.
